title: Calories in Grape Tomatoes
meta_description: Discover calories in grape tomatoes per 100 g, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and quick serving tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: Fresh, raw grape tomatoes (similar to cherry tomatoes, ~15-20 g each); no added seasonings or dressings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of grape tomatoes provides ~18 kcal and ~1.2 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Roasted with 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Add balsamic vinegar (1 tbsp per 100 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g grape tomatoes?
faqs.a: About 18 kcal per 100 g of fresh grape tomatoes.
Yes, ~3.9 g carbs per 100 g, with 1.2 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in grape tomatoes?
Do grape tomatoes have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low fat (~0.2 g per 100 g) and 0 mg cholesterol.

faqs.q: How do calories change if cooked?
faqs.a: Cooking methods like roasting with oil can add 40+ kcal per 100 g.
